getOperatorById(uint32).details: Gets an operator by operator id.

getOperatorsByValidator(bytes).details: Gets operators list which are in use by validator.

getValidatorsByAddress(address).details: Gets a validator public keys by owner's address.

params.fee: The fee which the operator charges for each block.
params.name: Operator's display name.
params.ownerAddress: Operator's ethereum address that can collect fees.
params.publicKey: Operator's public key. Will be used to encrypt secret shares of validators keys.

params.ownerAddress: The user's ethereum address that is the owner of the validator.

validators(bytes).details: Gets an validator by public key.
